snippet: The two main events at the Eastern States Regional in Manhattan were the Goldman Pairs and the Reisinger Knockout Teams.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on deal played during the Reisinger Knockout Teams at the Eastern States Regional in Manhattan.
